planet.name: Gliese 163 c
GJ 163 c
HIP 19394 c
LHS 188 c
planet.description: The HARPS team announced the discovery of a planetary system around the star Gliese 163 at this year's IAU conference. Gliese 163 c lies within the habitable zone for a wide range of albedo values and has an equilibrium temperature of 60C (140F).
